actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution relating to the status of Israeli prisoners of war (POWs) and missing in action (MIAs), and for other purposes.

summary.text: Urges the Government of Syria to: (1) provide the strictest accounting of all Israeli prisoners of war (POWs) and missing in action; (2) immediately release and repatriate any living Israeli POWs in its custody or the custody of its proxies in Lebanon; and (3) recover and return to Israel the bodies of Israeli soldiers interred in Syria or in formerly Syrian-controlled areas of Lebanon.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the status of Israeli prisoners of war (POWs) and missing in action (MIAs), and for other purposes.
